name: The Last of Us: Routes
description:
The first installment in the fan series tells the story of Joel who sets out to find Tommy who has not returned from his Route patrol. All rights belong to Naughty Dog. This is only a fan game inspired by the events in the original game. All music is not copyrighted.

FOLLOW US ON TWITTER

Beautiful, breathtaking visuals at every corner of the map.

Vast open areas that you can get to through extensive climbing mechanics.

What everyone likes the most, a intensive action oriented combat.

For those who prefer to get busy, enviromental puzzles.

CONTROLS 

Movement - WSAD | Left/right thumbstick

Sprint/run - Shift | Hold/press Left Thumbstick

Walking - Ctrl | Left thumbstick

Crouching - Left alt | B

Jumping - Space | A

Interaction - E | X

Aiming - Right mouse button | Left trigger

Shooting - Left mouse button | Right trigger

Weapon selection - 1,2,3 | Left D-pad, Right D-pad, Up D-pad
